email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $51.25 per metric ton, which is our best offer. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Can you confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement by end of day today. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. I’ll review the charter party agreement once received. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Cheers, John
